verses.text: A onh tic yuninal onhxo Jehová co Diosal. Manh cak' echnaj co nivanil, manh co joxpaxel xil co jolom d'a snanhal co sat ayic scham junoc anima,
yujto schonhab' Jehová co Diosal caji. A ix onh sik'anel d'a scal juntzanhxo chonhab' d'a sat luum tic, yic tzonh ochcan yicoc.
Manh e chi nok' nok' max chijilaj, nok' ay yovalil yuj Dios.
Aton nok' tic syal e chi'ani: Nok' vacax, nok' calnel, nok' chiva,
nok' ch'ucul, masanil macanhil nok' k'ultaquil chej yed' nok' caltacte'al chiva.
Syal e chi'an masanil nok' nok' sjax yanh, cha xechanh yech.

Axo pax nok' max yal-laj e chi'an jun, vach'chom sjax yanh nok' palta tato manh cha xechanhoc yech nok', aton nok' tic: Nok' camello, nok' nivac chich yed' nok' tojolal chich. A juntzanh nok' tic manh vach'oc nok', sjax yanh nok', palta manh cha xechanhoc yech nok'.
Yed' pax nok' chitam, cha xechanh yech nok', palta max sjaxlaj yanh nok'. A juntzanh nok' chi' yovalil tzeyojtaquejeli to manh vach'oc nok'. Manh e chi nok', manh eyam nok' ayic chamnacxo nok'.
Axo pax masanil nok' ay d'a yoltac a a', syal e chi'an nok' tato ay sk'axil nok' yed' stuminal spatic nok'.
A pax nok' malaj yic jun, manh e chi nok'. Yovalil tzeyojtaquejeli to manh vach'oc nok'.
Ay pax nok' much syal e chi'ani, nok' vach' icha yalan ley.
Palta ay juntzanh nok' max yal-laj e chi'ani: Nok' ch'acb'a, nok' vacavoc, nok' ch'acb'a yic a a',
nok' xulem, nok' milano,
yed' pax masanil macanhil nok' joj,
nok' avestruz, nok' nivac cujub', nok' xalunhe yed' masanil macanhil nok' ch'acb'a,
nok' tonton, nok' ibis yed' nok' pech,
nok' julum chay, nok' ostoc, nok' cormorán,
nok' cigüeña, nok' abubilla yed' nok' sotz'.
Masanil nok' cotac nok' ay sk'axil tz'ek' d'a juntac petanhil, manh vach'oc nok'. Max yal-laj e chi'an nok'.
Axo pax nok' cotac nok' to ay sk'axil alb'ilxo to vach', syal e chi'an nok'.

Manh e chi' junoc nok' tonhej scham d'a ichnhejta', yujto a onh tic sik'b'il onh el yuj Jehová co Diosal. Palta syal eyak'an nok' d'a eb' ch'oc chonhab'il ayek' cajan d'a e cal. A eb' chi' syal schi'an nok' eb'. Mato syalpax e chonhan nok' d'a eb' ch'oc chonhab'il tonhej sb'eyek' d'a e cal. Manh e tz'anh nok' yune' chiva d'a scal yal yim snun.
Junjun ab'il yovalil tzeyik'canel sdiezmoal sat eyavb'en yed' tastac tze mol sat.

Tzeyik'anb'at sdiezmoal ixim e trigo, e vino yed' eyaceite. Tzeyik'anpaxb'at sb'ab'el yune' nok' e vacax yed' sb'ab'el yune' nok' e calnel d'a jun lugar ol siq'uel Jehová co Diosal b'aj ol aj scajnub'. Ata' ol e va juntzanh chi' d'a yichanh Jehová yuj eyik'anchaanh.
Tato a jun lugar b'aj ay scajnub' chi', najat scan d'ayex, tato nivan svach'k'olal Jehová syak' d'ayex, max yal eyik'anb'at masanil e diezmo chi',
syal e chonhaneli, axo stojol tzeyik'b'at d'a scajnub' Jehová chi'.

Axo yed' stojol chi' syal e manan tas syal e k'ool: Nok' vacax, nok' calnel, vino, ma tas tz'uk'ji to pajxo, ma juntzanhxo tas tze nib'ej, tzex va d'a tzalajk'olal yed' eyal eyuninal d'a yichanh Jehová.
A eb' levita cajan d'a e cal, tzeyavtej eb' vael eyed'oc, yujto manh ol yik'laj sluum eb' smacb'enoc icha eyic a ex tic.
A slajvi junjun yoxil ab'il tzeyik'ancanel sdiezmoal sat eyavb'en yed' tas tze mol d'a jun ab'il chi'. Tze molb'ej d'a junoc lugar d'a yol e chonhab' chi'.

A eb' levita to maj schalaj sluum smacb'enoc eyed'oc, ma eb' ch'oc chonhab'il ayek' cajan d'a e cal, ma eb' meb'a' manhxa smam yed' eb' ix ix chamnac yetb'eyum, syal svaan eb' tastac tze mol d'a e diezmo chi', tz'acan slaj yik' yic eb'. Tato icha chi' tze k'ulej, ol yak' svach'k'olal Jehová co Diosal d'a yib'anh masanil tastac tze k'ulej.
